languages.text: Видя перемены в распределении власти в Просторе, хладные торговцы спешат заключить эксклюзивное торговое соглашение с династией. Первая крупная сделка положит начало взаимовыгодному сотрудничеству.

Sensing a shift in the balance of power in the Expanse, the Cold Traders are wasting no time in seeking to strike an exclusive trade agreement with the dynasty. The first major deal will pave the way for mutually profitable cooperation.
languages.original_text: Видя перемены в распределении власти в Просторе, хладные торговцы спешат заключить эксклюзивное торговое соглашение с династией. Первая крупная сделка положит начало взаимовыгодному сотрудничеству.

traits.locale_text: Observing a shifting balance of power in the Expanse, the Cold Traders are wasting no time in seeking to strike an exclusive trade agreement with the dynasty. The first major deal will pave the way for mutually profitable cooperation.

Sensing a shift in the balance of power in the Expanse, the Cold Traders are wasting no time in seeking to strike an exclusive trade agreement with the dynasty. The first major deal will pave the way for mutually profitable cooperation.

languages.text: 众多冷市商人都意识到科罗努斯扩区的力量平衡发生了变化。所有人都在抓紧时间，期望能与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝达成独家贸易协议。若是能达成一笔大手笔的买卖，肯定会为后续的互利合作铺平道路。
languages.original_text: Sensing a shift in the balance of power in the Expanse, the Cold Traders are wasting no time in seeking to strike an exclusive trade agreement with the dynasty. The first major deal will pave the way for mutually profitable cooperation.

traits.locale_text: 众多冷市商人都意识到科罗努斯扩区的力量平衡发生了变化。所有人都在抓紧时间，期望能与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝达成独家贸易协议。若是能达成一笔大手笔的买卖，肯定会为后续的互利合作铺平道路。

languages.text: エクスパンスにおける勢力図の変化を察知したコールド・トレーダーたちは、直ちに動き出し、この王朝との独占的な取引契約の締結を図っている。最初の大口取引が、双方に利益をもたらす協力関係への道を切り拓くことになるだろう。
languages.original_text: Sensing a shift in the balance of power in the Expanse, the Cold Traders are wasting no time in seeking to strike an exclusive trade agreement with the dynasty. The first major deal will pave the way for mutually profitable cooperation.

traits.locale_text: エクスパンスにおける勢力図の変化を察知したコールド・トレーダーたちは、直ちに動き出し、この王朝との独占的な取引契約の締結を図っている。最初の大口取引が、双方に利益をもたらす協力関係への道を切り拓くことになるだろう。

languages.text: Die Kalthändler spüren eine Verschiebung in der Machtstruktur der Ausdehnung und wollen unverzüglich ein exklusives Handelsabkommen mit der Dynastie abschließen. Das erste Geschäft wird den Weg für eine beiderseits profitable Zusammenarbeit ebnen.
languages.original_text: Sensing a shift in the balance of power in the Expanse, the Cold Traders are wasting no time in seeking to strike an exclusive trade agreement with the dynasty. The first major deal will pave the way for mutually profitable cooperation.

traits.locale_text: Die Kalthändler spüren eine Verschiebung in der Machtstruktur der Ausdehnung und wollen unverzüglich ein exklusives Handelsabkommen mit der Dynastie abschließen. Das erste Geschäft wird den Weg für eine beiderseits profitable Zusammenarbeit ebnen.

languages.text: Enginlik'te güç dengesinin değiştiğini sezen Soğuk Tacirler, hanedanlıkla münhasır bir ticaret muahedesi imzalamakta vakit kaybetmiyor. İlk büyük sözleşme, iki taraf için de kazançlı bir ortaklığın yolunu oluşturacak.
languages.original_text: Sensing a shift in the balance of power in the Expanse, the Cold Traders are wasting no time in seeking to strike an exclusive trade agreement with the dynasty. The first major deal will pave the way for mutually profitable cooperation.

traits.locale_text: Enginlik'te güç dengesinin değiştiğini sezen Soğuk Tacirler, hanedanlıkla münhasır bir ticaret muahedesi imzalamakta vakit kaybetmez. İlk büyük sözleşme, iki taraf için de kazançlı bir ortaklığın yolunu döşeyecektir.

languages.text: Al percibir un cambio en el equilibrio de poder en la Extensión, los Comerciantes Fríos no han perdido tiempo para intentar firmar un acuerdo comercial exclusivo con la dinastía. La primera gran transacción sentará las bases de una cooperación muy provechosa para ambas partes.
languages.original_text: Sensing a shift in the balance of power in the Expanse, the Cold Traders are wasting no time in seeking to strike an exclusive trade agreement with the dynasty. The first major deal will pave the way for mutually profitable cooperation.

traits.locale_text: Al percibir un cambio en el equilibrio de poder en la Extensión, los Comerciantes Fríos no han perdido tiempo para intentar firmar un acuerdo comercial exclusivo con la dinastía. La primera gran transacción sentará las bases de una cooperación muy provechosa para ambas partes.

languages.text: Dès que les adeptes du Commerce Froid ont senti que l'équilibre des pouvoirs commençait à vaciller dans les Étendues, ils ont cherché à conclure un marché exclusif avec la dynastie. Le premier accord de grande envergure ouvrira la voie à une coopération mutuellement profitable.
languages.original_text: Sensing a shift in the balance of power in the Expanse, the Cold Traders are wasting no time in seeking to strike an exclusive trade agreement with the dynasty. The first major deal will pave the way for mutually profitable cooperation.

traits.locale_text: Dès que les adeptes du Commerce Froid ont senti que l'équilibre des pouvoirs commençait à vaciller dans les Étendues, ils ont cherché à conclure un marché exclusif avec la dynastie. Le premier accord de grande envergure ouvrira la voie à une coopération mutuellement profitable.
